alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:52PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...LEWIS AND NORTHEASTERN OSWEGO COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Carthage to 9 miles south of Barnes Corners. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Herrings, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Greig, Copenhagen, Harrisville, Croghan, Castorland, Deferiet, Worth, Bellwood, Rector, and Diana Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
